module.name: ap210_assembly_physical_requirements
module.keywords: module, detailed physical requirement, assembly design, requirement allocation, electrical, connector placement, embedded component, configuration management, change management

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of assembly physical requirements. This Data includes all information provided to the design team that may be represented by shape data, including customer requirements, and technology selected to implement those requirements. Explicit allowed volumetric shape, external connection locations are included. Component grouping, keepout, keepin, etc is included. This data includes information required to support embedded components in an interconnect product. Configuration management information and design management information is provided. Preferred parts and packages may be specified by inclusion in design library. This data includes at least one geometric representation.

inscope.li: shape based requirements allocated to assembly design;
connector location requirements allocated to component in an assembly design;
component grouping requirements allocated to component in an assembly design;
keepin requirements allocated to component categories in an assembly design;
keepout requirements allocated to component categories in an assembly design;
items within the scope of application module Design product data management, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1628;
items within the scope of application module Assembly module usage view, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1642;
items within the scope of application module Test requirement allocation, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1751.
